com.tabuto.jsimlife.views
Class JSLMainView

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Window
              java.awt.Frame
                  javax.swing.JFrame
                      com.tabuto.jsimlife.views.JSLMainView
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class JSLMainView
extends javax.swing.JFrame

Class that creates the main window in which appears all the Game components:

  • JSLMenu: a menu bar;
  • JSLToolbar: a toolbar;
  • JSLSimulationView: the canvas panel where Zlifes lives;
  • JSLControlPanelView: the panel where some statistical information are displayed;
  • JSLStatusBar: the panel displayed some game informations;
This class uses the Configuration class in order to store some game parameters such as the canvas panel size, the background color of canvas panel, etc...

Author:
tabuto83
See Also:
Configuration, JSimLife, JSLSimulationView, Serialized Form
